result.arabic_text: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ
result.translation: Allah said, “We have certainly tested your people in your absence, and Sāmiri[25] has led them astray.”
result.footnotes: [25] i.e., the Samaritan (a man from Samaria), a hypocrite who led the Children of Israel to the worship of the calf, or to idol-worship.
